summary: The Perplexity AI Legal Policies show minor changes.  The most significant alteration is in the navigation menu, replacing "Enterprise & Developer Terms" with "Partner & Promotion Terms."  The content of the Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and Acceptable Use Policy remains largely the same, with only minor updates to wording and formatting. No substantial changes to legal obligations or user rights were detected.

changes: Navigation menu update: 'Enterprise & Developer Terms' replaced with 'Partner & Promotion Terms'.
unchanged: Core terms and conditions remain largely the same.
Arbitration clause and class action waiver are unchanged.

changes: Navigation menu update: 'Enterprise & Developer Terms' replaced with 'Partner & Promotion Terms'.
unchanged: Data collection, use, and disclosure practices largely remain the same.
Data security and retention policies are unchanged.
User rights remain largely the same.

changes: Navigation menu update: 'Enterprise & Developer Terms' replaced with 'Partner & Promotion Terms'.
unchanged: Acceptable use guidelines remain largely consistent.
Prohibitions against unlawful activities, high-risk behaviors, and technical misuse are unchanged.
